vote.title: Authorize a three-year cooperative purchasing agreement, with two three-year renewal options for (1) maintenance and support of an electronic document management system for the Department of Aviation with V.P. Imaging, Inc. dba DocuNav Solutions in the amount of $70,273.56; and (2) hosting services of an electronic document management system for the Department of Aviation with M&A Technology, Inc. through The Local Government Purchasing Cooperative (BuyBoard) agreement in the amount of $170,847.00 - Total amount not to exceed $241,120.56 - Financing:  Aviation Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize a three-year cooperative purchasing agreement, with two three-year renewal options for (1) maintenance and support of an electronic document management system for the Department of Aviation with V.P.
